You feel the fullness of your arcane potential while you wear this ring.

Ring Slot: Uncommon

Property:

You gain a +4 item bonus to Arcana checks.

Power âœ¦ Daily (Minor Action)

Requirement: You must be a wizard with a spellbook.

Effect: Choose one unused power that you have prepared from your spellbook. You prepare a different power in its place. The new power must be from your spellbook, of the same type as the replaced power (daily attack power or utility power), and of the same level or lower.

Milestone: If you've reached at least one milestone today, you gain a second use of this power before your next extended rest.
